intro.description:
Wonder how to open a new Data Browser plot? Cannot locate the 'Property' panel to configure the Data Browser? Closed the 'Archive Search' panel and now you want it back?
This gets you back to a default window setup:

item.title: Open new Plot
item.description: Select CSS->Trends->Data Browser in the menu bar at the top of the workbench.

item.title: Select Data Browser Perspective
item.description:
Right-click on plot, select "Data Browser Perspective".
If the Data Browser Perspective was already open, a dialog will appear that allows you to "Reset" it. Press "Yes", you're done!
If the Data Browser Perspective was not already open, it will now open. Right-click on the plot and select "Data Browser Perspective" again, and this time you can reset it.
item.onCompletion: You're done. There should be an 'Archive Search' panel to the left and 'Properties', 'Export Samples' panels at the bottom.
